Shockwave:

A purple space fighter blasted through space at a fast rate, slowly entering 
Earth's atmosphere.  Scanning the surface, he identified a mass energy 
signature, the Ark.  Already passing the ozone layer, he was visible from the 
ground now, barely.  All that could be seen without zoomed vision was a 
bright, small dot in the sky.  Checking his scanners, Shockwave was 5000 
miles and closing quickly on the Ark.  4600.  3980.






Name: Shockwave
Gender: Male
Alternate Modes: Ray Gun, space fighter
Side: None (OTHER, NOT NEUTRAL)

Character History:

Almost completely based on his namesake, Shockwave the leader of the 
Decepticon Empire in G1 Megatron's absence while on Earth, he was created in 
two hundred years ago.  Made by the Tripredacus Council in hopes of a new 
general, their plan backfired, Shockwave despising them for not being 
Decepticon, which technically he was.  Totally obliterating  the war factory 
where he was forged, he declared an all out war on the Tripredacus Council, 
in turn unintentionally helping the Maximal Elders in their own agendas.  
Adding a second mode, a space fighter, to his transformation capabilities, 
Shockwave escaped, the Tripredacus Council and Maximal Elders in a joint 
mission were trying to kill him.  Reaching past Earth, a place where most 
feared to tread, he decided to make his conquests there.  Not joining any of 
the factions, he found them all to be pathetic and irrelevant.

Character Personality:

Cold and brutal, he likes to take a scientific approach to war most of the 
time, though sometimes he will go on murderous instincts.  Is sometimes 
confounded by emotional and rash thinking.

Character Stats:

"Clarity of thought before rashness of action."

Function: Ground Descruction and Air/Space Support

Strength: 9.5
Intelligence: 10
Speed: 7
Endurance: 7
Rank: 9
Courage: 9
Firepower: 9
Skill: 10

Alternate Mode Descriptions:

Space Fighter:

Purple and blue, the cone has a spike extending from the point.  Maximum 
speed is Mach 5 and the Max range is 800,000 miles in a planet's atmosphere, 
Mach 10 in space with a range of 2 million miles.  With a variety of 
missiles, he also has laser weaponry, which makes his arsenal deadly.

Ray Gun:

Can fire deadly laser blasts, gamma rays, light, infra-red, radio waves, and 
x-rays.  Along with many more.  Has flight capabilties in the purple ray gun 
mode.

Robot Mode Description:  

Almost completely purple, his single yellow optic in the middle of his head 
gives him a wide variety of visions (check all vision capabilities in ray gun 
description).  With a laser weapon that extends instead of a hand on his 
right hand joint, it can be a hand or laser weapon.  In subspace he possesses 
energon, a repairing unit, a missile launcher, charges, and a laser rifle.  A 
large purple Decepticon symbol rests on his chest.
